A.story: An Ant found an Apple and shot an Arrow at an Axe.

B.story: A Bee rode a Bike carrying a Banana and read a Book.

C.story: The Cat drove a Car to get Cake and a Cup of tea.

D.story: A Dog played a Drum for a Duck by the Door.

E.story: The Elephant found an Egg and sent it via Envelope with an Eagle.

F.story: A Fox fished near a Fan and smelled a Flower.

G.story: The Goat played Guitar while rolling Grapes around the Globe.

H.story: A Horse wore a Hat and carried Honey to the House.

I.story: The Insect spilled Ink on the Ice outside the Igloo.

J.story: The Jaguar flew a Jet carrying Jam in a Jug.

K.story: A Kangaroo flew a Kite and held the Key while eating a Kiwi.

L.story: The Lion lit a Lamp on a Leaf and ate a Lemon.

M.story: A Monkey stared at the Moon while eating a Mango from a Mug.

N.story: A Nest hid a Nose under a Nail in the Net.

O.story: An Owl baked an Orange in the Oven with an Octopus watching.

P.story: The Penguin drew a Pencil on a Pineapple next to a Pumpkin.

Q.story: The Queen wrote with a Quill while the Quokka admired the Quilt.

R.story: The Rabbit jumped through a Rainbow and wore a Ring on the Rocket.

S.story: The Snake slept under the Sun near the Star in the Sand.

T.story: The Tiger climbed a Tree while eating a Tomato on a Train.

U.story: The Unicorn held an Umbrella over the Urchin in Uniform.

V.story: The Violin played next to a Vase by the Volcano in the Van.

W.story: The Whale spun the Wheel to slice the Watermelon in the Wind.

X.story: The Xerus played the Xylophone while looking at an X-ray in the Box.

Y.story: The Yak spun the Yo-yo with Yarn on the Yacht.

Z.story: The Zebra fixed a Zipper at the Zoo while eating Zucchini.
